lexUnit.name: threat.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: a statement of an intention to inflict injury, damage, or other hostile action as retribution.
